mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Kies, John
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Kies, John Patient Age: 30. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture of the right wrist. Conical bullet entered anterior aspect at lower extremity of ulna fracturing the carpal bones passing to exit at extremity of radius.. Location Wounded: Cedar Creek, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/10/19. Nature of Wound: Conical bullet. Treatment: November 15 - Amputated forearm lower third. Very little hemorage. Anesthesia by chloroform. Reacted promptly. Six ligatures were applied to arteries. Cold water dressing. . Result: Died of chronic diarrhea 1865/05/12.
